Hi Carol, glad to meet you!

Robin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=
: Carol B.<mailto:cbreck@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:=
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Saturday, January 19, 2008 11:43 AM
  Sub=
ject: [EVP-ITC] Introducing myself


  Hello all,

  My name is Carol and I=
've been an investigator for 10+ years. I'm new to
  the Frank's box device=
, and am totally fascinated by it! My husband works
  in recording studios =
and is willing to build me my first box. I would
  like to work with the RS=
 hack too. I've got many great class a evp's from
  my dvr...but I'm really=
 looking forwards to working with Frank's Box. 
  Glad to meet y'all.

  Ca=
rol B.
